cancelOwnershipHandover().details: Cancels a two step ownership transfer. Cancel the pending ownership handover, if any.

grantRoles(address,uint256).details: Allows the owner to grant `user` `roles`. If the `user` already has a role, then it will be an no-op for the role.

ordinalsFromRoles(uint256).details: Convenience function to return a `roles` bitmap from the `ordinals`. This is meant for frontends like Etherscan, and is therefore not fully optimized. Not recommended to be called on-chain.

owner().details: Returns the owner of the contract.

ownershipHandoverReceiver().details: Returns the receiver of the current ownership handover, if any.

proposeOwnershipHandover(address).details: Initiates a two step ownership transfer. Only one proposal can be active at once. If there is an existing active ownership handover, it will be overwritten.

receiveOwnershipHandover().details: Receive a two step ownership transfer. It will close the handover upon success.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the owner to renounce their ownership.

renounceRoles(uint256).details: Allow the caller to remove their own roles. If the caller does not have a role, then it will be an no-op for the role.

revokeRoles(address,uint256).details: Allows the owner to remove `user` `roles`. If the `user` does not have a role, then it will be an no-op for the role.

rolesFromOrdinals(uint8[]).details: Convenience function to return a `roles` bitmap from the `ordinals`. This is meant for frontends like Etherscan, and is therefore not fully optimized. Not recommended to be called on-chain.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the owner to transfer the ownership to `newOwner`.
